duties_responsibilities.duty: Reconcile simple to medium complex sub ledger accounts and financial records, and create analysis reports as needed.
Partner with business owners, customers, and suppliers to understand underlying business processes and ensure appropriate system and internal controls are in place.
Research and resolve discrepancies on general ledger accounts related to area of responsibility.
Communicate and train business process for assigned areas as needed.
Participate and/or lead team for process improvement, cost reduction, and issue resolution.
Work effectively and communicate in a cross-functional team environment.
Facilitate meetings with high-level cross-functional teams.
Utilize mainframe system, with experience in Oracle preferred.
Participate in or lead process improvement, cost reduction, and issue resolution activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent combination of education and experience.
